title: Why Secular Modernity Can't Stand Up to the New Religions: with BJ Campbell Handwaiving Freakoutery
description:
BJ Campbell is behind the Substack Handwaiving Freakoutery which is trying to take hard looks through the statistics to discover some reality. He recently was on @Rebel Wisdom discussing the rise of Egregores, spiritual entities that emerge from groups of people and play out in society. Covid and Sensemaking Crisis BJ Campbell https://youtu.be/4IjW16FCpkA
IDW Philosophia https://youtu.be/5KTlyQ5rWt0

I commented on that video here https://youtu.be/QHCACU53rqQ

Now he's in for a further conversation where we cover the ground and try to look at things without the lid of secularity. 

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/XBXwBBvf
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

Estuary Hub Link  https://www.estuaryhub.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
